attributes.title: Rating it one star because I cant rate it zero...
attributes.review: If this app is any resemblance of how the US will be run if Trump gets re elected I DONT WANT IT!! The app is slow and causes my phone to lag and glitches out every time i try opening the app. Would not recommend, save your time and phone storage.

attributes.title: MY PHONE TURNED ORANGE
attributes.review:
This app took WEEKS to downloaded, it was AStronomical. Within minutes of it downloading my phone began turning orange and the text started getting jumbled. It was as if it was a belligerent drunk Oompa Loompa.

After intense cleaning the orange finally came off, but it seemed to have angered the app. It began wiping out social media platforms and trying isolate me from the rest of the world. I got thrown into a worm hole of deep orange depression, think being in the bottom of a flaming hot Cheetos bag.

I couldnâ€™t take it anymore.

I deleted the app.

It was the most stressful day of my life.
